author: Indhukrishna
body:
## Environment data

Version - 0.5.0.2935

The Nuget package for Microsoft.Management.Infrastructure assemblies has this assembly. But PowerShell build does not have this.

comments.author: vors
comments.body: It's also true for CoreCLR package

comments.author: vors
comments.body: @dantraMSFT we need to figure out native dependencies in nuget packages story for MMIN

comments.author: vors
comments.body: Our friends from dotnet team suggested to take a look at the nuget package that is produced by https://github.com/dotnet/cli/tree/rel/1.0.0/TestAssets/TestPackages/PackageWithFakeNativeDep

title: Windows PowerShell build is missing Microsoft.Management.Infrastructure.Native.Unmanaged.dll
